skipButton.title: Ignorer
skipButton.note: Used to advance to the next step in the process

getStartedButton.title: Commencer
getStartedButton.note: Button text in the button used to start the process

gotIt.title: J'ai compris
gotIt.note: Button text used to confirm understanding of a particular step, used as an action to proceed

startBrowsing.title: Commencer la navigation
startBrowsing.note: Used as the final step in the process - to indicate that the next step will be using the browser

somethingWentWrong.title: Une erreur s'est produite
somethingWentWrong.note: A message shown when the application experienced a crash

youCanChangeYourChoicesAnyTimeInSettings.title: Vous pouvez modifier vos choix à tout moment dans Réglages.
youCanChangeYourChoicesAnyTimeInSettings.note: This is a statement with inline link, informing users that they can alter their preferences in `Settings` anytime. Please maintain the position of the opening `` and closing `` tag since they are used to create a link for the enclosed word only.

welcome_title.title: Bienvenue sur DuckDuckGo !
welcome_title.note: Page title for the first step in the process

getStarted_title.title: Marre d'être suivi(e) en ligne ?{newline}Nous pouvons vous aider !
getStarted_title.note: Page title indicating that DuckDuckGo can help against online trackers. Please adjust `{newline}` placement ensuring visual balance and readability.

privateByDefault_title.title: Contrairement à d'autres{newline}navigateurs, DuckDuckGo est doté par défaut d'une fonction de confidentialité
privateByDefault_title.note: Page title indicating that this application is private by default, requiring little to no user configuration. Please adjust `{newline}` placement ensuring visual balance and readability.

cleanerBrowsing_title.title: La confidentialité est aussi synonyme{newline}de moins de moins de publicités et de popups.
cleanerBrowsing_title.note: Page title highlighting that DuckDuckGo shows less advertisements and popups. Please adjust `{newline}` placement ensuring visual balance and readability.

systemSettings_title.title: Faites de la confidentialité votre priorité
systemSettings_title.note: Page title used in lists of toggle & switches that enable or disable particular privacy features

customize_title.title: Personnalisez votre expérience
customize_title.note: Page title used in lists of toggle & switches that enable or disable particular features

customize_subtitle.title: Faites fonctionner DuckDuckGo comme bon vous semble.
customize_subtitle.note: Shown under the main page title as encouragement to enable particular features

summary_title.title: Tout est prêt !
summary_title.note: Page title of the summary page. Indicates that all steps are complete

nextButton.title: Suivant
nextButton.note: Button text used to advance to the next step

row_search_title.title: Recherche privée
row_search_title.note: Title for the search feature status row, shows the status of the private search feature.

row_search_desc.title: Nous ne vous suivons pas. Jamais.
row_search_desc.note: Description for the search feature status row, emphasizes privacy.

row_search_summary.title: Recherche privée
row_search_summary.note: Summary title for the private search feature.

row_trackingProtection_title.title: Protection avancée contre le pistage
row_trackingProtection_title.note: Title for the tracking protection feature status row.

row_trackingProtection_desc.title: Nous bloquons la plupart des traqueurs avant même leur chargement.
row_trackingProtection_desc.note: Description for the tracking protection feature status row, emphasizes proactive blocking.

row_trackingProtection_summary.title: Protection avancée contre le pistage
row_trackingProtection_summary.note: Summary title for the tracking protection feature.

row_cookieManagement_title.title: Blocage automatique des popups pour cookies
row_cookieManagement_title.note: Title for the cookie management feature status row.

row_cookieManagement_desc.title: Nous refusons les cookies facultatifs pour vous et masquons les popups.
row_cookieManagement_desc.note: Description for the cookie management feature status row, emphasizes automated protection.

row_cookieManagement_summary.title: Blocage automatique des popups pour cookies
row_cookieManagement_summary.note: Summary title for the automatic cookie pop-up blocking feature.

row_fewerAds_title.title: En naviguant sur le web
row_fewerAds_title.note: Title for the fewer ads feature status row gist, clarifies where the feature is relevant.

row_fewerAds_summary.title: Moins de publicités et de popups
row_fewerAds_summary.note: Summary title for the fewer ads feature, describes the intended effect.

row_fewerAds_desc.title: Notre blocage des traqueurs élimine la plupart des publicités.
row_fewerAds_desc.note: Description for the fewer ads feature status row, explains how the feature works.

row_duckPlayer_summary.title: YouTube sans distractions
row_duckPlayer_summary.note: Summary title for the Duck Player feature, emphasizes a cleaner experience.

row_duckPlayer_title.title: En regardant YouTube
row_duckPlayer_title.note: Title for the Duck Player feature status row, clarifies where the feature is relevant.

row_duckPlayer_desc.title: Appliquez les paramètres de confidentialité les plus stricts de YouTube par défaut. Regardez des vidéos en profitant d'une expérience de visionnage épurée, sans publicités personnalisées.
row_duckPlayer_desc.note: Description for the Duck Player feature status row, states the feature's purpose and execution.

row_dock_title.title: Gardez DuckDuckGo dans votre barre des tâches
row_dock_title.note: Suggests users to keep DuckDuckGo in their taskbar for quick access.

row_dock_summary.title: Épingler à la barre des tâches
row_dock_summary.note: The text shown on the button to perform the action to pin DuckDuckGo to the taskbar.

row_dock_desc.title: Accédez plus rapidement à DuckDuckGo.
row_dock_desc.note: Description for keeping DuckDuckGo in the taskbar, emphasizes on speed and ease of access.

row_dock_accept.title: Épingler à la barre des tâches
row_dock_accept.note: The text shown in the button to confirm pinning DuckDuckGo to the taskbar.

row_dock_macos_title.title: Garder DuckDuckGo dans votre Dock
row_dock_macos_title.note: Suggests users to keep DuckDuckGo in their Dock for quick access.

row_dock_macos_accept.title: Garder dans le Dock
row_dock_macos_accept.note: The text shown on the button to perform the action to keep DuckDuckGo in the users Dock.

row_import_title.title: Emportez tout avec vous
row_import_title.note: Title for importing user data (bookmarks, favorites, passwords) to DuckDuckGo from other browsers.

row_import_summary.title: Importez vos données
row_import_summary.note: Summary title for the import feature, refers to personal browser data.

row_import_desc.title: Importez les signets, les favoris et les mots de passe.
row_import_desc.note: Description for the import feature, lists specific items that can be imported.

row_import_accept.title: Importer
row_import_accept.note: The text shown in the button to perform the import action.

row_default-browser_title.title: Changez de navigateur par défaut
row_default-browser_title.note: Title for the default browser suggestion, encourages users to make DuckDuckGo their primary browser.

row_default-browser_summary.title: Navigateur par défaut
row_default-browser_summary.note: Summary title for the default browser switch feature.

row_default-browser_desc.title: Naviguez toujours de manière confidentielle par défaut.
row_default-browser_desc.note: Description for the default browser switch feature, emphasizes privacy.

row_default-browser_accept.title: Définir par défaut
row_default-browser_accept.note: The text shown in the button to perform the action to make DuckDuckGo the default browser.

row_bookmarks_title.title: Placez vos signets à portée de main
row_bookmarks_title.note: Title for the bookmarks bar feature, suggests placing bookmarks in an easily accessible location.

row_bookmarks_summary.title: Barre des signets
row_bookmarks_summary.note: Summary title for the bookmarks bar.

row_bookmarks_desc.title: Affichez une barre de signets avec tous vos favoris.
row_bookmarks_desc.note: Description for the bookmarks bar feature, describes the outcome.

row_bookmarks_accept.title: Afficher la barre des signets
row_bookmarks_accept.note: The text shown on the button to show the bookmarks bar.

row_session-restore_title.title: Reprenez là où vous en étiez
row_session-restore_title.note: Title for the session restoring feature, suggests resuming from the point where the user last stopped.

row_session-restore_summary.title: Reprise de session
row_session-restore_summary.note: Summary title for the session restore feature.

row_session-restore_desc.title: Redémarrez toujours avec toutes les fenêtres de votre dernière session.
row_session-restore_desc.note: Description for the session restoring feature, elaborates on its functionality.

row_session-restore_accept.title: Activer la reprise de session
row_session-restore_accept.note: The text shown on the button to enable the session restore feature.

row_home-shortcut_title.title: Ajoutez un raccourci à votre page d'accueil
row_home-shortcut_title.note: Title for the home button feature, suggests adding a shortcut to the homepage for easy access.

row_home-shortcut_summary.title: Bouton d'accueil
row_home-shortcut_summary.note: Summary title for the home button, refers to a toolbar feature.

row_home-shortcut_desc.title: Affichez un bouton d'accueil dans votre barre d'outils.
row_home-shortcut_desc.note: Description for the home button feature, outlines the outcome.

row_home-shortcut_accept.title: Afficher le bouton d'accueil
row_home-shortcut_accept.note: The text shown on the button to show the home button.

beforeAfter_fewerAds_show.title: Voir avec le blocage des traqueurs
beforeAfter_fewerAds_show.note: Option for comparing browsing with and without tracker blocking.

beforeAfter_fewerAds_hide.title: Voir sans le blocage des traqueurs
beforeAfter_fewerAds_hide.note: Option for comparing browsing with and without tracker blocking.

beforeAfter_duckPlayer_show.title: Voir avec Duck Player
beforeAfter_duckPlayer_show.note: Option for comparing YouTube viewing experience with and without Duck Player.

beforeAfter_duckPlayer_hide.title: Voir sans Duck Player
beforeAfter_duckPlayer_hide.note: Option for comparing YouTube viewing experience with and without Duck Player.

getStarted_title_v3.title: Bonjour.{paragraph}Prêt pour un navigateur plus rapide{newline}qui vous protège ?
getStarted_title_v3.note: Introductory text when a user starts the onboarding process. `{paragraph}` and `{newline}` should not be translated. Please adjust `{newline}` placement ensuring visual balance and readability.

getStartedButton_v3.title: C'est parti !
getStartedButton_v3.note: Button label prompting user to start the onboarding process.

protectionsActivated_title.title: Protections activées !
protectionsActivated_title.note: Title for a page that shows all the protections offered by the DuckDuckGo browser and how they compare to other browsers.

makeDefaultButton.title: Faites de DuckDuckGo votre application de navigateur par défaut
makeDefaultButton.note: Button label prompting user to set DuckDuckGo as their default browser.

makeDefaultAccept_title.title: Excellent ! J’espérais que vous me choisiriez.
makeDefaultAccept_title.note: Page title shown if a user chose to make DuckDuckGo their default browser.

taskbar_title.title: Vous voulez que je reste dans la barre des tâches ?
taskbar_title.note: Title for a page that asks the user to add the DuckDuckGo browser to their Windows taskbar.

dock_title.title: Vous voulez que je reste dans le box ?
dock_title.note: Title for a page that asks the user to add the DuckDuckGo browser to their dock on macOS.

duckPlayer_title.title: YouTube vous inonde de publicités ? Pas avec Duck Player !
duckPlayer_title.note: Title for a page that shows the benefits of using the Duck Player feature to watch YouTube videos more privately.

duckPlayer_subtitle.title: Pas de publicités ciblées. Aucune recommandation ciblée. Juste votre vidéo.
duckPlayer_subtitle.note: Subtitle for a page that shows the benefits of using the Duck Player feature to watch YouTube videos more privately.

customize_title_v3.title: Personnalisons quelques éléments…
customize_title_v3.note: Title for a page that allows the user to customize specific settings in the DuckDuckGo browser.

customize_subtitle_v3.title: Configurez les choses exactement comme vous le souhaitez.
customize_subtitle_v3.note: Subtitle for a page that allows the user to customize specific settings in the DuckDuckGo browser.

systemSettings_title_v3.title: Laissez-nous vous aider à tout installer !
systemSettings_title_v3.note: Title for a page that allows the user to customize system settings for the DuckDuckGo browser

systemSettings_subtitle_v3.title: Il est facile de faire de moi votre navigateur de référence.

row_bookmarks_title_v3.note: Heading for a toggle that puts the bookmarks bar withing easy reach of the user.

row_home-shortcut_title_v3.note: Heading for a toggle that adds the user's homepage to the browser toolbar.

row_default-browser_title_v3.note: Title for the default browser suggestion, encourages users to make DuckDuckGo their primary browser.

row_import_title_v3.note: Title for importing user data (bookmarks, passwords) to DuckDuckGo from other browsers.

row_import_summary_v3.title: Le cryptage sur l'appareil permet de sécuriser vos mots de passe.
row_import_summary_v3.note: Explanation of additional security benefits of importing user's passwords into DuckDuckGo.

row_import_accept_v3.title: Importer dès maintenant
row_import_accept_v3.note: The text shown in the button to perform the import action.

row_taskbar_title_v3.title: Gardez DuckDuckGo dans votre barre des tâches
row_taskbar_title_v3.note: Suggests users to keep DuckDuckGo in their taskbar for quick access.

row_dock_title_v3.note: Suggests users to keep DuckDuckGo in their dock for quick access.
